column2: Dedicated hotline to address HCPartners’ queries expediently. Priority processing for transactions with MOM.

Endorsed with the “Human Capital Partner” mark that will recognise them as employers of choice. Invited to various events and networking sessions where they can learn and share their best practices with peers to further strengthen their human capital practices. Opportunities to be featured in HCP publicity materials.
Access to government support and resources to further develop human capital such as those under:  SkillsFuture
